StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateScheduledToShipSummary]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@FiscalYear int ,@Month int ,@OrgId int ,@Rmnps int ,@Kg int ,@Ka int ,@Rfnps int ,@Kf int ,@Ps int )
AS
UPDATE [usmc].[ScheduledToShip] SET [RMNPS] = @Rmnps ,[KG] = @Kg ,[KA] = @Ka ,[RFNPS] = @Rfnps ,[KF] = @Kf ,[PS] = @Ps WHERE [FiscalYear] = @FiscalYear AND [Month] = @Month AND [Organiza.onId] = @OrgId
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0
INSERT INTO [usmc].[ScheduledToShip] ([FiscalYear] ,[Month] ,[Organiza.onId] ,[RMNPS] ,[KG] ,[KA] ,[RFNPS] ,[KF] ,[PS]) VALUES (@FiscalYear ,@Month ,@OrgId ,@Rmnps ,@Kg ,@Ka ,@Rfnps ,@Kf ,@Ps)
